title: Advanced Cloud Architect
description: Develop and refine the agency’s cloud strategy in alignment with the mission. Select appropriate cloud service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) and providers, considering factors like scalability, security, and cost-efficiency. Architecture Design: Design cloud-based architectures that are scalable, resilient, and secure.

managing cloud strategies aligned with organizational goals
secure cloud-based architectures using cloud-native technologies

title: Advanced Operational Data Science Lead

Develop and execute an organization change management and training plan for process improvement. Develop business process and data models and maintain an enterprise data dictionary for operational data. Guide the implementation of AI based tools for process improvement

title: Intermediate Digital Forensics Analyst
